name: Umeå Energi AB
goal:
Umeå Energi is a municipally-owned energy and
communications group. Our owner directive indicates
we should promote the development of the municipality and great respect for the environment in the short and long term secure a sustainable energy supply for the first
Umeå municipality's residents. The Company shall also
responsible for open networks for electricity distribution
broadband and managed cost-effectively, and that they
has a high reliability.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Sustainable bioenergy policy for the period after 2020.
The Industrial Emissions Directive (IED) 2010/75/EU
